# Project Signature Protocol

## Signature Block Format

```
H&&S|B&&P|C&&V|E&&I
```

### Legend

| Symbol | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| H&&S | Human && System |
| B&&P | Bound && Propagate |
| C&&V | Context && Vortex |
| E&&I | Emergence && Iteration |

---

## Usage

